subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Giants’ offensive line, coming off a dreadful performance in last Sunday’s loss at the Carolina Panthers, will be missing two starters when the 0-3 team visits the 3-0 Kansas City Chiefs.
snippet: The Giants’ offensive line, coming off a dreadful performance in last Sunday’s loss at the Carolina Panthers, will be missing two starters when the 0-3 team visits the 3-0 Kansas City Chiefs.
